name: VOYDYS
description:
HOW TO PLAY

[ Move towards your target indicated by the BLACK DIAMOND shape ]

[ Dash from platform to platform with the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON ]

When the cursor is RED - you can dash

[ Attack you target with the  LEFT MOUSE BUTTON ]

When the cursor is YELLOW - you can attack

TAKE TOO LONG AND YOU DIE

  • Bonus points for being quick
  • Bonus points for being precise

Made for and during the JUICE JAM (https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam) in two days.
